mapper.insert: insert into address (user_id, consignee, phone, detail_location, is_default, create_time, update_time) values (#{userId}, #{consignee}, #{phone}, #{detailLocation}, #{isDefault}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update: update address set is_default = ${@com.yw.secondhandtrade.common.constant.StatusConstant@NON_DEFAULT_ADDRESS} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select * from address where user_id = #{userId} order by is_default asc, update_time desc
